name: Submerciless II LD48 Version
description:
Pistol Duel But With Submarines

Made in 72 Hours April17-26 2021 for Ludum Dare 48

Instructions are in game.  Mostly meant as a two player game but added a really awful AI mode.  Basically, your targeting pipper gets more accurate with time, but how long do you wait and risk your opponent firing first? Shoot torpedos!  Dodge torpedos by going deeper!  Decipher cryptic Russian submarine controls!  This game has it all.  (Those three things.)

Also included a "Tweak" menu in case the default timings and values I set aren't the funnest.

All music, sounds, "graphics" made during the jam.  With the exception of a menu system I reuse for every game, all code made during the jam.

If it opens in the wrong size, you can sort things out by hittin F8/F9 to resize the window, " / " sets it to windowed fullscreen, and the numpad " * " sets it to fullscreen.
